A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed it! The more I watch it\, the more I notice\, and the deeper levels of meaning I find in it. The fact that this movie has multiple psychological layers and its use of Joseph Campbell's monomyths show that the director new exactly what he was doing. Those who were expecting a shallow \"guy movie\" will be the first to complain about it and express their hatred for the director. Out of all the Star Wars movies that exist\, this is the one I keep rewatching.
